contents.short_description: Syria under Assad’s rule is shattered. Aleppo in ruins, Damascus showing a facade of normalcy, and conflict raging in northwest Syria. What really lies beneath this broken nation?

contents.title: Remember Pearl Harbor (Narrated by Tom Selleck)
contents.short_description: Survivors of the Pearl Harbor attack who saw the events up close have one message - don't forget one of the most violent days in history.

castncrew.Cast: Shakuntala Agrawal, Sushma Mehrotra, Ashfaq Ullah Khan, Sumit Rastogi, Richard Slade, Poonam Mehrotra

contents.description: Reality in the small town of Shahjahanpur in north India is much stranger than fiction. Every year, on the day of Holi, the festival of color, one man - ‘Laatsahab’ - is put atop a bullock cart and paraded around town to be abused, beaten and splashed with colored water. He is garlanded with shoes, and followed around the city by a frenzied mob that celebrates this assault. Explore this bizarre tradition, and the conflict between those who perpetuate it and those who seek an end to this mindless violence.

genres_assign.name: Culture
genres_assign.description: Explore scintilating stories on love, relationship, sex, religion, and various aspects of life. Discover various cultures and ways of living through these documentaries.

genres_assign.name: Humanity
genres_assign.description: Get captivated with gripping stories that will either melt your heart or blow your mind. Watch stories of humanity's triumph of the will, mankind's quest to go beyond the mundane, and more.

contents.short_description: A man is paraded through a city to be beaten and abused in a ritual as cherished as it is despised.
contents.title: Shahjahanpur ka Laatsahab
contents.long_summary: The popularity of Indian festival of color, Holi, has reached the world. However in the small town of Shahjahanpur, a bizarre tradition is associated with the festival. One man, 'Laatsahab' is put on top of a bullock cart and taken all over the town so people can beat him, abuse him and splash color at him. Watch from up close this strange custom and the clash between those who follow it and other
contents.short_summary: A man is paraded through a city to be beaten and abused in a ritual as cherished as it is despised.

spanish.title: Shahjahanpur ka Laatsahab
spanish.short_description: Un hombre es paseado por una ciudad para ser golpeado y maltratado en un ritual tan querido como despreciado.
spanish.short_summary: Un hombre es paseado por una ciudad para ser golpeado y maltratado en un ritual tan querido como despreciado.
spanish.description: La realidad en el pequeño pueblo de Shahjahanpur, en el norte de la India, es mucho más extraña que la ficción. Cada año, en el día de Holi, el festival de los colores, un hombre, conocido como 'Laatsahab', es colocado en lo alto de un carro de bueyes y paseado por la ciudad para ser maltratado, golpeado y salpicado con agua coloreada. Es adornado con guirnaldas de zapatos y seguido por una multitud frenética que celebra este asalto. Explora esta extraña tradición y el conflicto entre aquellos que la perpetúan y aquellos que buscan poner fin a esta violencia sin sentido.
spanish.long_summary: La realidad en el pequeño pueblo de Shahjahanpur, en el norte de la India, es mucho más extraña que la ficción. Cada año, en el día de Holi, el festival de los colores, un hombre, conocido como 'Laatsahab', es colocado en lo alto de un carro de bueyes y paseado por la ciudad para ser maltratado, golpeado y salpicado con agua coloreada. Es adornado con guirnaldas de zapatos y seguido por una multitud frenética que celebra este asalto. Explora esta extraña tradición y el conflicto entre aquellos que la perpetúan y aquellos que buscan poner fin a esta violencia sin sentido.

castncrew.Cast: Shakuntala Agrawal, Sushma Mehrotra, Ashfaq Ullah Khan, Sumit Rastogi, Richard Slade, Poonam Mehrotra

burmese.title: Shahjahanpur ka Laatsahab
burmese.short_description: မထီမဲ့မြင်ပြုသကဲ့သို့ မြတ်နိုးအပ်သည့် ထုံးတမ်းစဉ်လာအရ ရိုက်နှက်ညှဉ်းပန်းနှိပ်စက်ခြင်းကို ခံရန် မြို့တစ်မြို့၌ ချီတက်ကြသည်။
burmese.short_summary: မထီမဲ့မြင်ပြုသကဲ့သို့ မြတ်နိုးအပ်သည့် ထုံးတမ်းစဉ်လာအရ ရိုက်နှက်ညှဉ်းပန်းနှိပ်စက်ခြင်းကို ခံရန် မြို့တစ်မြို့၌ ချီတက်ကြသည်။
burmese.description: အိန္ဒိယနိုင်ငံ မြောက်ပိုင်းရှိ Shahjahanpur မြို့ငယ်လေးတွင် လက်တွေ့ဘဝသည် စိတ်ကူးယဉ်ထက် များစွာထူးဆန်းသည်။ နှစ်စဉ်နှစ်တိုင်း Holi, ရောင်စုံပွဲတော်တွင်, လူတစ်ဦး - 'Laatsahabâ€™ - နွားလှည်းပေါ်တွင်တင်, အစော်ကားခံရဖို့, ရိုက်နှက်, ရောင်စုံရေဖြင့်ပက်ရန်မြို့ပတ်ပတ်လည်ချီတက်ကြသည်။ သူသည် ဖိနပ်များဖြင့် ပန်းကုံးစွပ်ထားပြီး၊ ဤတိုက်ခိုက်မှုကို ဂုဏ်ပြုသော အရူးအမူး လူအုပ်ကြီးက မြို့အနှံ့ လိုက်လာခဲ့သည်။ ဤထူးထူးဆန်းဆန်း ဓလေ့ထုံးတမ်းများကို စူးစမ်းလေ့လာပါ၊ ၎င်းကို ဆက်လက်တည်မြဲနေသူများနှင့် ဤဉာဏ်မဲ့အကြမ်းဖက်မှုကို အဆုံးသတ်ရန် ရှာဖွေနေသူများအကြား ပဋိပက္ခများ။
burmese.long_summary: အိန္ဒိယနိုင်ငံ မြောက်ပိုင်းရှိ Shahjahanpur မြို့ငယ်လေးတွင် လက်တွေ့ဘဝသည် စိတ်ကူးယဉ်ထက် များစွာထူးဆန်းသည်။ နှစ်စဉ်နှစ်တိုင်း Holi, ရောင်စုံပွဲတော်တွင်, လူတစ်ဦး - 'Laatsahabâ€™ - နွားလှည်းပေါ်တွင်တင်, အစော်ကားခံရဖို့, ရိုက်နှက်, ရောင်စုံရေဖြင့်ပက်ရန်မြို့ပတ်ပတ်လည်ချီတက်ကြသည်။ သူသည် ဖိနပ်များဖြင့် ပန်းကုံးစွပ်ထားပြီး၊ ဤတိုက်ခိုက်မှုကို ဂုဏ်ပြုသော အရူးအမူး လူအုပ်ကြီးက မြို့အနှံ့ လိုက်လာခဲ့သည်။ ဤထူးထူးဆန်းဆန်း ဓလေ့ထုံးတမ်းများကို စူးစမ်းလေ့လာပါ၊ ၎င်းကို ဆက်လက်တည်မြဲနေသူများနှင့် ဤဉာဏ်မဲ့အကြမ်းဖက်မှုကို အဆုံးသတ်ရန် ရှာဖွေနေသူများအကြား ပဋိပက္ခများ။

contents.short_description: How did a pacifist become the person who laid the foundation for the creation of the deadliest bomb in history? Find out in this film.

contents.short_description: In a bold 2018 heist, a royal artifact vanished from Hyderabad’s Nizam Museum—sparking a true-crime hunt to recover stolen heritage.

contents.title: Kargil 1999: The Untold Story Of The Indian Air Force
contents.short_description: The IAF veterans reveal for the first time, classified information on their operation for reclaiming high-altitude posts intruded by the Pakistan army.

contents.title: LOST WHISPERS IN THE DISTANCE
contents.short_description: Iranian and Afghan refugees in Serbian camps reveal truths of perilous journeys, pursuing dreams of a better life in Europe.

contents.title: The Summer of Love
contents.short_description: Can music drive social & political change? Watch this film which captures how music & pop culture drove anti-war & civil rights movement.

contents.title: Western Down Under
contents.short_description: Can the Aussie cowboys, the Mills, survive the dangerous outback and protect their cattle worth millions of dollars?

contents.title: Zongo
contents.short_description: What does it take to break the circle of misery? A young African tribesman goes on a journey to overcome his criminal past & empower his community.

contents.title: Che Guevara, Beyond The Myth
contents.short_description: Did Che Guevara create his image as a fiery guerilla fighter or was it media that got besotted with the man's charisma & created his image?

contents.short_description: The story of Iran's only Empress, Farah Pahlavi, who saw Iran at the peak of westernization only to have later made to flee the nation.

contents.title: CHASING MANDELA'S RAINBOW
contents.short_description: Three students' divergent paths symbolize South Africa's pursuit of Mandela's dream.

contents.title: Discovering Lennon
contents.short_description: Contemporaries and current commentators reflect on the role of John Lennon, the artist and radical thinker.

contents.title: DIRTY Entertainers THE BUSINESS OF INDIAN EROTICA - Hindi
contents.short_description: An inside look at India’s erotica industry, where creators and actors expose a hidden world shaped by survival, secrecy, desire, and taboo.

contents.title: REGIMENT DIARIES
contents.short_description: A four-part journey into India’s military soul, revealing the legacy & spirit of Garhwal Rifles, Mechanized Infantry, Madras Engineers & Grenadiers.

contents.title: Amazing Albania
contents.short_description: Snow-capped mountains, pristine lakes, lovely people - all this & more makes Albania an amazing nation to travel in Europe!

contents.title: CHINA EXPRESS
contents.short_description: The beauty of modern China through culture, cuisine, and breathtaking landscapes with Xu and Jérémy.

contents.title: Journeys In India
contents.short_description: From sighting a leopard in a park to getting drenched in Holi colors, Bill Ball goes on another adventure - this time in incredible India.

contents.title: Magical Oman
contents.short_description: Oman is full of secrets, mysteries & shocking discoveries that will leave you spellbound. Witness the allure of the 'Pearl of Arabia'.

contents.title: Wanderlust!
contents.short_description: A Buddhist monk in Germany. Songs about drinking with enemies. Beautiful landscapes with riveting human stories. This film captures them all!

contents.title: Epic Trails
contents.short_description: Eric Hanson is set out to measure the vast lengths of the earth through hiking, caving, camping & all that there is to adventure!

contents.title: Luxury Travel Show
contents.short_description: Discover incredible, luxurious places full of grandeur & opulence from across the world that attracts holiday goers as well backpackers.

contents.title: Goa Gajah, Indonesia
contents.short_description: Explore the wondrous island of Bali through its magical blend of cultures, people, art and exquisite geography.

contents.title: The Life-Sized City with Mikael Colville-Andersen
contents.short_description: Reimagining vibrant metropolises as sustainable, people-centric urban oases worldwide.

contents.title: Travel Quest
contents.short_description: Using stone money, meeting jaguars, shark diving - it's adventure unlimited with Bill!

contents.title: Antarctica Searching for Adaptation
contents.short_description: Scientists brave Antarctica’s extremes to measure ice loss, probe wildlife resilience, and uncover insights for humanity’s future.

contents.title: The Food Race - Pesticides, GMOs and Organic Farming on the test
contents.short_description: Massive wheat crop failure led to the violent Arab Spring that brought down regimes. Can we increase food production for a stable future?

contents.title: NEW LAND the islands of Marker Wadden
contents.short_description: In the Markermeer, a vast lake created by Dutch engineering, one of Europe’s largest nature restoration projects aims to heal the land and restore the ecosystem.

contents.title: IRAN SHORT OF WATER
contents.short_description: Iran's largest river Zayandeh Rood is dangerously drying up creating tensions over water crisis! Is there a solution for this water crisis?

contents.title: Climate Emergency When The Young Radicalise...
contents.short_description: New environmental activists Julie and Marion face backlash for blocking roads and vandalizing art to protest climate inaction.

contents.title: When The River Runs Dry
contents.short_description: As the Murray-Darling River is drying up, indigenous elders and locals expose Australia’s Government and the big-business greed of selling water.

contents.title: GREEN WARRIORS PARIS METRO : AIR ALERT
contents.short_description: An investigation reveals toxic air in the Paris metro, exposing commuters to heavy metals and sparking urgent health concerns.

contents.title: Agarzari
contents.short_description: Meet the men and women who dare to live with tigers, on a safari through the Tadoba-Andhari Tiger Reserve in India.

contents.title: All the World is Babylon
contents.short_description: The film powerfully holds up a mirror to show how corporate greed leads to dangerous neglect of Climate Change issues.

contents.title: Islands of the Future: Iceland
contents.short_description: Witness the Green Paradise at the Crossroads in Iceland. Life here, far from the mainland and major cities, has always meant looking for means of survival.

contents.short_description: A criminal nexus in India's cities exploits water supply for profit. First time ever, an expose.

contents.short_description: Indian phone scammers pose as IRS officers, frauding over thousands of Americans for more than $50 million.

contents.short_description: Victims expose the toll of cybercrime, with $6 trillion stolen yearly and lives shattered—tragically, even a baby’s death in America.

contents.title: VOYAGE OF THE CONTINENTS
contents.short_description: The tallest mountain vanished, an ecosystem was perished, seas got swallowed - the constant tectonic shifts define life on earth even today.
